Nothing in this subsection creates any protective

The fact that a nonwilderness activity or use
			 on land outside the Wilderness additions can be seen or heard within the
			 Wilderness additions shall not preclude the activity or use outside the
			 boundary of the Wilderness additions.

Nothing in this subsection diminishes any treaty
			 rights of an Indian tribe.

			 primary purpose of which is ecological or aquatic restoration; and

that provides a
			 net benefit to water quality and aquatic resources.

Nothing
			 in this paragraph prohibits any department or agency of the United States in
			 assisting by loan, grant, license, or otherwise, a water resources
			 project—

The approximately 3.3-mile segment of Quartz Creek from its

The approximately 5.7-mile segment of the North Fork
